Description:
111021/NDUS/01 - You failed, to conduct and record a suitable and sufficient risk assessment of the diving operation undertaken by you on the 6th October 2021. The generic risk assessment provided, did not detail the risks involved in the use of Self-Contained Underwater Breathing Apparatus (SCUBA) whilst diving between the nets on a fish farm where the risk of running out of air is high if the diver becomes entangled. It also did not detail the site-specific risks and actions to be taken in the event of a foreseeable diving emergency.

111021/NDUS/02 - You have failed to plan, manage, and conduct a diving operation on the 6th October 2021, in that you did not develop a plan that allows you to manage and conduct diving at work in a manner that protects the health and safety of all persons taking part in that project.

111021/NDUS/03 - You do not have a suitable system in place for ensuring that the diving plant is maintained in a safe working condition giving rise to a risk to the health and safety of other divers in that the life support equipment might fail underwater.
